channel.title: Xbox 360 Slim
channel.description:
Apparently Microsoft will be announcing a slimmed down version of the 360 at E3 to be released along side Natal, it will have a new logo and it will be black just like the Elite. [url='https://newsoftrockhallelujah.blogspot.com/2010/04/slim-360-to-be-unveiled-at-e3-360.html']Full Story[/url]
I know half of you probably don't care about consoles but please do share your thoughts on this topic. :slight_smile:
[COLOR='Red']UPDATE - Apparently a [url='https://newsoftrockhallelujah.blogspot.com/2010/04/like-taking-candy-from-baby.html']big load of shit[/url], better luck next time. :frowning:

item.title: Xbox 360 Slim
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
To save the 360, Microsoft has to release a bigger, fatter version of it, with Blu-ray and built-in watercooling.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 Slim
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
this is stupid, my mw2 console is perfect, besides, more empty room inside the xbox more room for it to cool down helps the fight aganst Rrod in my opinion, otherwise itll be too cramped.

item.title: Xbox 360 Slim

item.description:
Either make a new console or don’t. Don’t pull the same thing Nintendo is with the DS and make a bunch of useless upgrades.
